# Source Holiday-Api

## Configuration

| Input | Type | Description | Default Value |
|-------|------|-------------|---------------|
| `api_key` | `string` | API Key.  |  |
| `country` | `string` | Country Or State. For countries, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 or ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 format. For states / provinces (with our States & Provinces plan), ISO 3166-2 format. Accepts up to 10 comma separated values. | US |
| `number_of_years` | `string` | Number of Years.  | 3 |
| `year` | `string` | Year.  |  |
